description: As it states in the Oath to $er "I swear to you, $er the builder born from the bera trenches, that I will be loyal, become smarter, and stronger with my brethren. I pledge my eth, time, and love. I will strive to build trust in a trustless world, and uphold integrity to the highest standard. I AM NOT HERE FOR THE ART. So help me $er."
name: An Oath to $er
